Player History
Drafted in 26th round, 404th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit on 4/26/2016, off Carlos Rivero (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/21/2016, off Risaburou Eichi (DET)...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/19/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Injured on 8/14/2018 with a Ruptured Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 10 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2019 to a minor league contract.
Released by San Francisco on 10/23/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/5/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $1,170,000 per year...
